summary: Implements the integration of AWS Athena as an offline feature store for Feast, providing configuration handling, SQL query construction for historical and latest feature retrieval (including point‑in‑time joins), execution of retrieval jobs, and persistence of logged feature values.
business_intent: Allow Feast users to store, query, and materialize feature data in Athena, enabling scalable offline feature engineering, model training, and feature logging without managing a separate data warehouse.
